perfect_form.description: athlete performing squat with perfect form knees tracking over toes throughout entire movement chest up and shoulders retracted neutral spine with slight forward lean full depth below parallel smooth controlled descent smooth controlled ascent no momentum or bouncing

good_form.description: squat with good form knees mostly tracking over toes chest elevated neutral spine full or near-full depth controlled movement minor inconsistencies acceptable

partial_depth.description: squat movement but not reaching full depth stopping above parallel shallow squat missing full range of motion

knee_valgus.description: squat with knees caving inward valgus collapse knees not tracking over toes inward cave on ascent form breakdown

excessive_lean.description: squat with excessive forward lean torso folding over knees too much forward pitch compensatory movement poor mechanics

chest_collapse.description: squat with chest collapsed rounded upper back loss of neutral spine core disengagement poor positioning

bouncing.description: squat with bouncing or momentum at bottom using elastic rebound instead of controlled movement jerky motion

heels_up.description: squat with heels lifting off ground shifting weight to toes instability ankle mobility issue

perfect_form.description: deadlift with perfect form neutral spine throughout shoulders over bar chest elevated scapulae engaged smooth continuous pull no hitching no bar drifting from body stable lockout at top

good_form.description: deadlift with good form neutral or near-neutral spine shoulders approximately over bar chest elevated mostly smooth pull bar path mostly straight minor deviations acceptable

rounded_back.description: deadlift with rounded lower back lumbar flexion spine curvature loss of neutral position dangerous form breakdown

hips_too_high.description: deadlift with hips positioned too high excessive hip extension early glute-dominant pull improper setup inefficient positioning

shoulders_behind_bar.description: deadlift with shoulders positioned behind bar unstable starting position early back engagement poor mechanics

bar_drifting.description: deadlift with bar drifting away from body swinging forward excessive forward trajectory inefficient pull poor bar path

hitching.description: deadlift with hitching movement stalling at mid-shin multiple pulls bumping hips jerky movement

incomplete_lockout.description: deadlift with incomplete lockout not fully extending at top hips not fully extended knees still bent

perfect_form.description: bench press with perfect form elbows at approximately 45 degrees full range of motion bar touching chest stable shoulders scapulae retracted smooth concentric and eccentric phases controlled lockout at top

good_form.description: bench press with good form elbows mostly at 45 degrees good range of motion bar near chest stable shoulders mostly smooth movement minor inconsistencies acceptable

elbows_flared.description: bench press with elbows excessively flared wide arms perpendicular to body shoulder impingement risk poor mechanics increased injury risk

partial_range.description: bench press with partial range of motion not bringing bar to chest stopping above chest incomplete rep quarter reps

bouncing.description: bench press with bouncing ball touching chest using elastic rebound unstable movement jerky motion

bar_path_unstable.description: bench press with unstable bar path bar drifting sideways uneven pressing one side higher than other

shoulder_instability.description: bench press with shoulder instability shoulders rising off bench shoulder shrugging scapulae not retracted loose shoulders

incomplete_lockout.description: bench press with incomplete lockout not fully extending elbows at top half lockout bent elbows at lockout

perfect_form.description: barbell row with perfect form neutral spine slight forward lean chest up scapulae retracted smooth pull bar to chest elbows driven back controlled eccentric full range of motion

good_form.description: barbell row with good form good spinal position mostly chest up mostly retracted scapulae good pull height controlled movement minor deviations acceptable

rounded_back.description: barbell row with rounded lower back lumbar flexion loss of neutral spine dangerous form poor spinal alignment

excessive_lean.description: barbell row with excessive forward lean using momentum compensating with hips excessive weight shift poor form

chest_not_up.description: barbell row with chest not elevated chest folded over poor upper back engagement reduced range of motion

elbows_wide.description: barbell row with elbows flared excessively wide poor scapular mechanics reduced back engagement shoulder strain

partial_range.description: barbell row with partial range of motion bar not reaching chest short pull incomplete movement

bouncing_momentum.description: barbell row with bouncing or using momentum jerky movement elastic rebound using lower body help

perfect_form.description: overhead press with perfect form neutral spine core engaged bar starting at shoulders scapulae retracted smooth pressing motion elbows under bar full lockout overhead stable throughout

good_form.description: overhead press with good form mostly neutral spine core engaged good starting position mostly smooth pressing motion elbows mostly under bar good lockout minor deviations acceptable

excessive_lean.description: overhead press with excessive forward or backward lean arching back using momentum shifting weight compensatory movement

core_disengagement.description: overhead press with loose core weak bracing spinal instability excessive back arch loss of neutral spine

elbows_flared.description: overhead press with elbows excessively flared wide improper positioning shoulder impingement poor mechanics

bar_path_unstable.description: overhead press with unstable bar path bar drifting forward or sideways uneven pressing wobbly

incomplete_lockout.description: overhead press with incomplete lockout not fully extending elbows at top bent elbows overhead half lockout

head_blocking.description: overhead press with head in bar path not pressing through bar head not moving back improper bar path
